mapper.insert: INSERT blog (birth, title, author, preview, text, category, date, birthUrl, readCount, authorId) VALUES(#{birth}, #{title}, #{author}, #{preview}, #{text}, #{category}, #{date}, #{birthUrl}, #{readCount}, #{authorId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM blog WHERE authorId=#{authorId} ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blog WHERE title LIKE #{title} ORDER BY id DESC;
